item.description:
If you enjoy Karaoke and live in or near Boston, then this is the Meetup for you. We generally get everyone together once a month for a fun evening of Karaoke. We have met at the Limelight in Boston and the Karaoke Courtside in Cambridge. We'll probably try some new places as well.

No prior experience necessary. Just be ready to have a good time. We have a rather ecclectic group and the music will range from pop to rock to oldies to soul to alternative to rap to country. We welcome all types of music.

Some of our members are very good singers and they provide quality entertainment. Other members are just starting out we give them a supportive and encouraging environment to learn. So whether you are a professional or a novice, you would fit right in. I look forward to seeing you at an upcoming get together.

- Phil
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup Group
